verses.verse: These are the statutes <WH2706> and judgments <WH4941>, which ye shall observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> in the land <WH776>, which the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of thy fathers <WH1> giveth <WH5414> thee to possess <WH3423> it, all the days <WH3117> that ye live <WH2416> upon the earth <WH127>.

Ye shall utterly <WH6> destroy <WH6> all the places <WH4725>, wherein the nations <WH1471> which <WH834> ye shall possess <WH3423> served <WH5647> their gods <WH430>, upon the high <WH7311> mountains <WH2022>, and upon the hills <WH1389>, and under every green <WH7488> tree <WH6086>: possess: or, inherit

And ye shall overthrow <WH5422> their altars <WH4196>, and break <WH7665> their pillars <WH4676>, and burn <WH8313> their groves <WH842> with fire <WH784>; and ye shall hew down <WH1438> the graven images <WH6456> of their gods <WH430>, and destroy <WH6> the names <WH8034> of them out of that place <WH4725>. overthrow: Heb. break down
Ye shall not do so <WH6213> unto the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>.

But unto the place <WH4725> which the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall choose <WH977> out of all your tribes <WH7626> to put <WH7760> his name <WH8034> there, even unto his habitation <WH7933> shall ye seek <WH1875>, and thither thou shalt come <WH935>:

And thither ye shall bring <WH935> your burnt offerings <WH5930>, and your sacrifices <WH2077>, and your tithes <WH4643>, and heave offerings <WH8641> of your hand <WH3027>, and your vows <WH5088>, and your freewill offerings <WH5071>, and the firstlings <WH1062> of your herds <WH1241> and of your flocks <WH6629>:

And there ye shall eat <WH398> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and ye shall rejoice <WH8055> in all that ye put <WH4916> your hand <WH3027> unto, ye and your households <WH1004>, wherein the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath blessed <WH1288> thee.
Ye shall not do <WH6213> after all the things that we do <WH6213> here this day <WH3117>, every man <WH376> whatsoever is right <WH3477> in his own eyes <WH5869>.
For ye are not as yet come <WH935> to the rest <WH4496> and to the inheritance <WH5159>, which the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> you.

But when ye go over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383>, and dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> which the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> giveth you to inherit <WH5157>, and when he giveth you rest <WH5117> from all your enemies <WH341> round about <WH5439>, so that ye dwell <WH3427> in safety <WH983>;

Then there shall be a place <WH4725> which the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall choose <WH977> to cause his name <WH8034> to dwell <WH7931> there; thither shall ye bring <WH935> all that I command <WH6680> you; your burnt offerings <WH5930>, and your sacrifices <WH2077>, your tithes <WH4643>, and the heave offering <WH8641> of your hand <WH3027>, and all your choice <WH4005> vows <WH5088> which ye vow <WH5087> unto the LORD <WH3068>: your choice: Heb. the choice of your vows

And ye shall rejoice <WH8055> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, ye, and your sons <WH1121>, and your daughters <WH1323>, and your menservants <WH5650>, and your maidservants <WH519>, and the Levite <WH3881> that is within your gates <WH8179>; forasmuch <WH3588> as he hath no part <WH2506> nor inheritance <WH5159> with you.
Take heed <WH8104> to thyself that thou offer <WH5927> not thy burnt offerings <WH5930> in every place <WH4725> that thou seest <WH7200>:

But in the place <WH4725> which the LORD <WH3068> shall choose <WH977> in one <WH259> of thy tribes <WH7626>, there thou shalt offer <WH5927> thy burnt offerings <WH5930>, and there thou shalt do <WH6213> all that I command <WH6680> thee.

Notwithstanding thou mayest kill <WH2076> and eat <WH398> flesh <WH1320> in all thy gates <WH8179>, whatsoever thy soul <WH5315> lusteth after <WH185>, according to the blessing <WH1293> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> which he hath given <WH5414> thee: the unclean <WH2931> and the clean <WH2889> may eat <WH398> thereof, as of the roebuck <WH6643>, and as of the hart <WH354>.
Only ye shall not eat <WH398> the blood <WH1818>; ye shall pour <WH8210> it upon the earth <WH776> as water <WH4325>.

Thou mayest <WH3201> not eat <WH398> within thy gates <WH8179> the tithe <WH4643> of thy corn <WH1715>, or of thy wine <WH8492>, or of thy oil <WH3323>, or the firstlings <WH1062> of thy herds <WH1241> or of thy flock <WH6629>, nor any of thy vows <WH5088> which thou vowest <WH5087>, nor thy freewill offerings <WH5071>, or heave offering <WH8641> of thine hand <WH3027>:

But thou must eat <WH398> them before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> shall choose <WH977>, thou, and thy son <WH1121>, and thy daughter <WH1323>, and thy manservant <WH5650>, and thy maidservant <WH519>, and the Levite <WH3881> that is within thy gates <WH8179>: and thou shalt rejoice <WH8055> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> in all that thou puttest <WH4916> thine hands <WH3027> unto.
Take heed <WH8104> to thyself that thou forsake <WH5800> not the Levite <WH3881> as long as thou livest <WH3117> upon the earth <WH127>. as long: Heb. all thy days

When the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> shall enlarge <WH7337> thy border <WH1366>, as he hath promised <WH1696> thee, and thou shalt say <WH559>, I will eat <WH398> flesh <WH1320>, because thy soul <WH5315> longeth <WH183> to eat <WH398> flesh <WH1320>; thou mayest eat <WH398> flesh <WH1320>, whatsoever thy soul <WH5315> lusteth after <WH185>.

If the place <WH4725> which the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath chosen <WH977> to put <WH7760> his name <WH8034> there be too far <WH7368> from thee, then thou shalt kill <WH2076> of thy herd <WH1241> and of thy flock <WH6629>, which the LORD <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> thee, as I have commanded <WH6680> thee, and thou shalt eat <WH398> in thy gates <WH8179> whatsoever thy soul <WH5315> lusteth after <WH185>.
Even as the roebuck <WH6643> and the hart <WH354> is eaten <WH398>, so thou shalt eat <WH398> them: the unclean <WH2931> and the clean <WH2889> shall eat <WH398> of them alike <WH3162>.

Only be sure <WH2388> that thou eat <WH398> not the blood <WH1818>: for the blood <WH1818> is the life <WH5315>; and thou mayest not eat <WH398> the life <WH5315> with the flesh <WH1320>. be: Heb. be strong
Thou shalt not eat <WH398> it; thou shalt pour <WH8210> it upon the earth <WH776> as water <WH4325>.

Thou shalt not eat <WH398> it; that it may go well <WH3190> with thee, and with thy children <WH1121> after <WH310> thee, when thou shalt do <WH6213> that which is right <WH3477> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068>.
Only thy holy things <WH6944> which thou hast, and thy vows <WH5088>, thou shalt take <WH5375>, and go <WH935> unto the place <WH4725> which the LORD <WH3068> shall choose <WH977>:

And thou shalt offer <WH6213> thy burnt offerings <WH5930>, the flesh <WH1320> and the blood <WH1818>, upon the altar <WH4196> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>: and the blood <WH1818> of thy sacrifices <WH2077> shall be poured out <WH8210> upon the altar <WH4196> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and thou shalt eat <WH398> the flesh <WH1320>.

Observe <WH8104> and hear <WH8085> all these words <WH1697> which I command <WH6680> thee, that it may go well <WH3190> with thee, and with thy children <WH1121> after <WH310> thee for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>, when thou doest <WH6213> that which is good <WH2896> and right <WH3477> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>.

When the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> shall cut off <WH3772> the nations <WH1471> from before <WH6440> thee, whither thou goest <WH935> to possess <WH3423> them, and thou succeedest <WH3423> them, and dwellest <WH3427> in their land <WH776>; succeedest: Heb. inheritest, or, possessest them

Take heed <WH8104> to thyself that thou be not snared <WH5367> by following <WH310> them, after <WH310> that they be destroyed <WH8045> from before <WH6440> thee; and that thou enquire <WH1875> not after their gods <WH430>, saying <WH559>, How did these nations <WH1471> serve <WH5647> their gods <WH430>? even so will I do <WH6213> likewise <WH1571>. by: Heb. after them

Thou shalt not do <WH6213> so unto the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>: for every abomination <WH8441> to the LORD <WH3068>, which he hateth <WH8130>, have they done <WH6213> unto their gods <WH430>; for even their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> they have burnt <WH8313> in the fire <WH784> to their gods <WH430>. to the: Heb. of the
What thing <WH1697> soever I command <WH6680> you, observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> it: thou shalt not add <WH3254> thereto, nor diminish <WH1639> from it.
